title: kaNNeDuthagilum
sahitya:
kaNNeDuttAgilum kAnIrO en tAviya mAlaiyaip-pUNIrO



anupallavi



paNNum panuvalum bharatamum viratamum bhaktiyum koNDingE nittiyam

tozhum ennai 



caraNam



pErukkum pugazhukkum pErAshai paDavillai tanga padakkangaLai enrum nADavillai ayyA

eTTeTTu dikkilum Odavillai ummai idaya mOnattil anri-tEDavillai ayyA
